major_arcana.name: The Fool
major_arcana.meaning: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Naivety, foolishness, recklessness, risk-taking

major_arcana.name: The Magician
major_arcana.meaning: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, inspired action
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents

major_arcana.name: The High Priestess
major_arcana.meaning: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal and silence

major_arcana.name: The Empress
major_arcana.meaning: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Creative block, dependence on others

major_arcana.name: The Emperor
major_arcana.meaning: Authority, establishment, structure, a father figure
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility

major_arcana.name: The Hierophant
major_arcana.meaning: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo

major_arcana.name: The Lovers
major_arcana.meaning: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values

major_arcana.name: The Chariot
major_arcana.meaning: Control, willpower, success, action, determination
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Self-discipline, opposition, lack of direction

major_arcana.name: Strength
major_arcana.meaning: Strength, courage, persuasion, influence, compassion
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Inner strength, self-doubt, weakness, insecurity

major_arcana.name: The Hermit
major_arcana.meaning: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal

major_arcana.name: Wheel of Fortune
major_arcana.meaning: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles

major_arcana.name: Justice
major_arcana.meaning: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty

major_arcana.name: The Hanged Man
major_arcana.meaning: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision

major_arcana.name: Death
major_arcana.meaning: Endings, change, transformation, transition
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging

major_arcana.name: Temperance
major_arcana.meaning: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment

major_arcana.name: The Devil
major_arcana.meaning: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment

major_arcana.name: The Tower
major_arcana.meaning: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster

major_arcana.name: The Star
major_arcana.meaning: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection

major_arcana.name: The Moon
major_arcana.meaning: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion

major_arcana.name: The Sun
major_arcana.meaning: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, vitality
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic

major_arcana.name: Judgement
major_arcana.meaning: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, absolution
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call

major_arcana.name: The World
major_arcana.meaning: Completion, integration, accomplishment, travel
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: Seeking personal closure, short-cuts, delays

wands.name: Ace of Wands
wands.reversed_meaning: An emerging idea, lack of direction, distractions, delays

wands.name: Two of Wands
wands.reversed_meaning: Fear of unknown, lack of planning

wands.name: Three of Wands
wands.reversed_meaning: Lack of foresight, delays, obstacles to long-term goals

wands.name: Four of Wands
wands.reversed_meaning: Personal celebration, inner harmony, conflict with others

wands.name: Five of Wands
wands.reversed_meaning: Inner conflict, conflict avoidance, tension release

wands.name: Six of Wands
wands.reversed_meaning: Private achievement, personal definition of success, fall from grace, egotism

wands.name: Eight of Wands
wands.meaning: Movement, fast paced change, action, alignment

wands.name: Nine of Wands
wands.meaning: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith, boundaries
wands.reversed_meaning: Inner resources, struggle, overwhelm, defensive, paranoia

wands.name: Ten of Wands
wands.meaning: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion
wands.reversed_meaning: Doing it all, carrying the burden, delegation, release

wands.name: Page of Wands
wands.meaning: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, limitless potential, free spirit
wands.reversed_meaning: Newly-formed ideas, redirecting energy, self-limiting beliefs, a spiritual path

wands.name: Knight of Wands
wands.meaning: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness
wands.reversed_meaning: Passion project, haste, scattered energy, delays, frustration

wands.name: Queen of Wands
wands.meaning: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination
wands.reversed_meaning: Self-respect, self-confidence, introverted, a blocked creative spark

cups.name: Three of Cups
cups.reversed_meaning: Independence, alone time, hardcore partying, ‘three’s a crowd’

cups.name: Four of Cups
cups.reversed_meaning: Retreat, withdrawal, checking in for alignment

cups.name: Six of Cups
cups.meaning: Revisiting the past, childhood memories, innocence, joy
cups.reversed_meaning: Living in the past, forgiveness, lacking playfulness

cups.name: Seven of Cups
cups.reversed_meaning: Alignment, personal values, overwhelmed by choices

cups.name: Eight of Cups
cups.reversed_meaning: Trying one more time, indecision, aimless drifting, walking away

cups.name: Nine of Cups
cups.meaning: Contentment, satisfaction, gratitude, wish come true

cups.name: Ten of Cups
cups.meaning: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment

cups.name: Page of Cups
cups.meaning: Creative opportunities, intuitive messages, curiosity, possibility
cups.reversed_meaning: New ideas, doubting intuition, creative blocks, emotional immaturity

cups.name: Queen of Cups
cups.meaning: Compassionate, caring, emotionally stable, intuitive, in flow

cups.name: King of Cups
cups.reversed_meaning: Self-compassion, inner feelings, moodiness, emotionally manipulative

swords.name: Ace of Swords
swords.meaning: Breakthroughs, new ideas, mental clarity, success
swords.reversed_meaning: Inner clarity, re-thinking an idea, clouded judgement

swords.name: Two of Swords
swords.meaning: Difficult decisions, weighing up options, an impasse, avoidance

swords.name: Three of Swords
swords.meaning: Heartbreak, emotional pain, sorrow, grief, hurt
swords.reversed_meaning: Negative self-talk, releasing pain, optimism, forgiveness

swords.name: Five of Swords
swords.meaning: Conflict, competition, defeat, winning at all costs

swords.name: Six of Swords
swords.meaning: Transition, change, rite of passage, releasing baggage
swords.reversed_meaning: Personal transition, resistance to change, unfinished business

swords.name: Seven of Swords
swords.meaning: Betrayal, deception, getting away with something, acting strategically

swords.name: Eight of Swords
swords.meaning: Negative thoughts, self-imposed restriction, imprisonment, victim mentality
swords.reversed_meaning: Self-limiting beliefs, inner critic, releasing negative thoughts, open to new perspectives

swords.name: Nine of Swords
swords.reversed_meaning: Inner turmoil, deep-seated fears, secrets, releasing worry

swords.name: Ten of Swords
swords.meaning: Painful endings, deep wounds, betrayal, loss, crisis
swords.reversed_meaning: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end

swords.name: Page of Swords
swords.meaning: New ideas, curiosity, thirst for knowledge, new ways of communicating
swords.reversed_meaning: Self-expression, all talk and no action, haphazard action, haste

swords.name: Knight of Swords
swords.meaning: Ambitious, action-oriented, driven to succeed, fast-thinking

swords.name: Queen of Swords
swords.meaning: Independent, unbiased judgement, clear boundaries, direct communication

swords.name: King of Swords
swords.meaning: Mental clarity, intellectual power, authority, truth
swords.reversed_meaning: Quiet power, inner truth, misuse of power, manipulation

pentacles.name: Ace of Pentacles
pentacles.reversed_meaning: Lost opportunity, lack of planning, missed chances

pentacles.name: Two of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Multiple priorities, time management, prioritisation, adaptability

pentacles.name: Four of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Saving money, security, conservatism, scarcity, control

pentacles.name: Five of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Financial loss, poverty, lack mindset, isolation, worry
pentacles.reversed_meaning: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty

pentacles.name: Six of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Giving, receiving, sharing wealth, generosity, charity

pentacles.name: Seven of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Long-term view, sustainable results, perseverance, investment
pentacles.reversed_meaning: Lack of long-term vision, limited success or reward

pentacles.name: Eight of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Apprenticeship, repetitive tasks, mastery, skill development

pentacles.name: Ten of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Wealth, financial security, family, long-term success, contribution
pentacles.reversed_meaning: The dark side of wealth, financial failure or loss

pentacles.name: Page of Pentacles
pentacles.reversed_meaning: Lack of progress, procrastination, learn from failure

pentacles.name: Queen of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, a working parent

pentacles.name: King of Pentacles
pentacles.meaning: Wealth, business, leadership, security, discipline, abundance
pentacles.reversed_meaning: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth and status, stubborn
